list.s: SAGE libraries were prepared from naïve and 9-day NGF-treated PC12 cells and sequenced as previously described [ 11 ] . To match SAGE tags with RP transcripts, tags were initially analyzed with the National Center for Biotechnology Information (NCBI) rat SAGE tag to gene mapping database ftp://ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pub/sage/map/Rn/Nla3, which matches possible 14-mer tags with known rat genes and expressed sequence tags (ESTs).
